interviews.text: This is a test interview transcript. The participant discussed their experience with the product, mentioning both positive and negative aspects. They particularly liked the user interface but found some features difficult to understand.

In this interview, the participant shared detailed feedback about the onboarding process. They found it mostly straightforward but suggested adding more interactive tutorials. They also mentioned having trouble with the advanced features.

project.name: Product Feedback Study
project.description: Gathering user feedback on the new features
